sentences.sentence: The risks can be so complex that banks hire mathematicians to assess them.
sentences.translation: 这类风险可以是如此复杂以至于银行雇佣数学家们去评估它们。

sentences.sentence: Only when each logical step has been checked by other mathematicians will the proof be accepted.
sentences.translation: 只有在每个逻辑步骤都由其他数学家验证之后，该证明才会被接受。

sentences.sentence: Some present the lives of colorful mathematicians.
sentences.translation: 其中一些展示了丰富多彩的数学家的生活。
